mapper.select: select idx, userpw, pinno, joindate, regexp_replace(userid,'-','*',4) as userid, regexp_replace(username,'-','*',2) as username, regexp_replace(phone,'(\d{3})\-(\d{3,4})\-(\d{4})', '\1-****-\3') as phone, concat('***',substr(email, 4, length(email))) as email from spring_member

select count(case when age<10 then 1 end) "10세미만", count(case when age between 10 and 19 then 1 end) "10대", count(case when age between 20 and 29 then 1 end) "20대", count(case when age between 30 and 39 then 1 end) "30대", count(case when age between 40 and 49 then 1 end) "40대", count(case when age between 50 and 59 then 1 end) "50대", count(case when age between 60 and 59 then 1 end) "60대", count(case when age between 70 and 79 then 1 end) "70대", count(case when age>=80 then 1 end) "80세 이상" from (select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-concat(case when substr(pinno,8,1) in ('1','2') then '19' else '20' end, substr(pinno,1,2)) as age from spring_member)
select count (case when substr(pinno,8,1) in ('1','3') then 1 end) "men", count (case when substr(pinno,8,1) in ('2','4') then 1 end) "women" from spring_member
